=======
midanki
=======


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/midanki.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/midanki

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/j718/midanki.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.com/j718/midanki

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/midanki/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://midanki.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Statuspip


.. image:: https://pyup.io/repos/github/j718/midanki/shield.svg
     :target: https://pyup.io/repos/github/j718/midanki/
     :alt: Updates



Converts midi input to keyboard input for anki reviews.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://midanki.readthedocs.io.
